tool.name: Protein-protein Interaction
tool.description: Map your proteins on a reference human interactome
tool.command:
#if $inputtype.filetype == "copy_paste": python $__tool_directory__/interactomicsCyJS.py --inputtype copypaste --input '$inputtype.genelist' --column c1 --interactome '$interactome' --jsonoutput '$outputjson' --taboutput '$condtabfile.taboutput' --interactometype '${interactome.fields.dbkey}' --addReactome '$addReactome' --reactomeFile $__tool_directory__/UniProt2Reactome.txt --header FALSE #end if
#if $inputtype.filetype == "file_all":
python2.7 $__tool_directory__/interactomicsCyJS.py --inputtype tabfile --input '$inputtype.genelist' --column '$inputtype.column' --interactome '$interactome' --jsonoutput '$outputjson' --taboutput '$condtabfile.taboutput' --interactometype '${interactome.fields.dbkey}' --addReactome '$addReactome' --reactomeFile $__tool_directory__/UniProt2Reactome.txt --header '$inputtype.header'
#end if

param.name: filetype
param.label: Select your type of input file
param.help: The input file must contain Uniprot Accession IDs. If it is not the case, please refer to the mapping component.

param.name: genelist
param.label: Choose a multiple-columns file
param.help: This file must imperatively have 1 column filled with Uniprot Accession IDs. Please use the MappingIDs component if this is not the case.

param.name: column
param.label: Please specify the column where you would like to apply the comparison (e.g : Enter c1)

param.name: header
param.label: Does your file have a header?

param.name: interactome
param.label: Choose a reference interactome to map on

param.name: taboutput
param.label: Generate an additional tabular file of the network
